author: Xbox
description:
YOU WERE BUILT TO BREAK THE SYSTEM

This is Deus Ex Remastered – the definitive version of Ion Storm’s legendary cyberpunk immersive sim, modernized with visual upgrades, modern enhancements, and quality-of-life improvements for a new generation of operatives. 

The year is 2052. Societies are teetering on collapse, plagues spread unchecked, and shadow governments shape the future. You are JC Denton—a nano-augmented UNATCO operative tasked with protecting order. But the deeper you dig, the more lies you uncover. What begins as a mission becomes a fracture point in human history.

 https://www.xbox.com/games/store/deus-ex-remastered/9P3H32VKG5LQ

author: Xbox
description:
Enter the Shelter, your home base in PRAGMATA to upgrade and unlock your abilities, and much more. Build your arsenal and prepare for what awaits you on the lunar research station. 

Capcom’s newest IP—PRAGMATA. An all-new Science Fiction action adventure with its own unique hacking twist! 

It is the near future, and protagonists Hugh and his android companion Diana, must work together as they make their way through the cold lunar research station. 

Coming to Xbox Series X|S in 2026!

description:
The upcoming swordplay action game from Capcom, Onimusha: Way of the Sword, has a brand new trailer: Musashi's Story.

Taking on the power of the Oni against his will, we take a closer look at Miyamoto Musashi's story and meet new characters who intertwine with it.

Coming to Xbox Series X|S in 2026!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/onimusha-way-of-the-sword/9PJMHTRC9WKB/0010

description:
Experience the compelling story and battle or trade online with all the Mega Man Star Force games banded together in one ultimate package!

Mega Man Star Force Pegasus
Mega Man Star Force Leo
Mega Man Star Force Dragon
Mega Man Star Force 2 Zerker x Ninja
Mega Man Star Force 2 Zerker x Saurian
Mega Man Star Force 3 Black Ace
Mega Man Star Force 3 Red Joker

In an era where EM-Waves connect everything, harness the bond between Geo Stelar and the visitor from outer space Omega-Xis to transform into Mega Man and protect the world!

Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection pulses in on Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S in 2026!

author: Xbox
description:
No additional subscriptions. No paywalls. Just racing.

Get ready to race the world on Nov 25. 2 Leaderboard Modes: Chase real-world lap times in Factory Driver Challenges, and long-distance Endurance Hall Events to mimic legendary real-world races. No fee custom lobbies. Social Races. Scheduled Racing. And best of all—Cross-Play Online for big grid and bigger grins. 

No fees, no fuss, just fun. See you on the grid!

description:
A LEGEND IS REBORN AND A NEW LEGACY BEGINS - Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties is a two-in-one experience coming February 12, 2026 to Xbox Series X|S.

🏍️Pre-order to get the 'Ryukyu Gal Gang: Ichiban Legendary Lad' DLC to add Ichiban Kasuga to your biker gang.

🔗https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n2370ncnw1m
🔴Yakuza Kiwami 3 is an extreme remake of the action-adventure beat 'em up Yakuza 3 featuring ex-yakuza Kazuma Kiryu's fight to protect those he loves. 
⚫Dark Ties is a brand-new game featuring Yoshitaka Mine from Yakuza 3 included as a separate action-packed experience.

😇🤜👿 Introducing a whole new way to dominate Purgatory! The Rogue Angel mode harnesses chaos and forges it into a crucible. 

Team up with your fellow demon hunters and descend into a twisted new realm of Purgatory, where procedurally generated arenas, unpredictable drops, and brutal enemies await. Each death offers a lesson. Every run improves your skills. Every step brings you closer to becoming unstoppable.

description:
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/wizordum/9p0l34crpr8x

Wizordum has arrived on Xbox! Wizordum is the fantasy shooter that fans of Catabombs Abyss, Wolfenstein 3D, DOOM, Duke Nukem 3D, Heretic, and Hexen have been waiting for. Step into the boots of a powerful Mage as you battle across the kingdom of Terrabruma, tracking down the source of Chaos. Armed with enchanted weapons and devastating spells, you’ll fight goblins, skeletons, ghosts, and worse across sprawling levels packed with puzzles, traps, and secrets.

author: Xbox
description:
A story about the future. A question about today. Where every choice matters.

Step into a future where happiness is curated by artificial intelligence, in this gentle-paced puzzle adventure.

The Utopia Project was created in the interest of maximizing human happiness and comfort. As the newest residential Facilitator at D-topia, your role is to resolve issues around the residential community. Tackle fun logic-based puzzles to resolve mechanical issues and keep the facilities running smoothly and meet the many vibrant residents, each with their own unique story and personal struggle.

But what happens when problems go beyond the mechanical? How will your choices impact the wellbeing of the residents, and the future of humanity? In a world of curated happiness, what does it mean to find purpose?

Developed by Marumittu Games. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© 2025 Mittu Topia, LLC. Developed by Marumittu Games, LLC. Published by Annapurna Interactive. All rights reserved.

title: D-Topia Reveal Trailer
